Techniques.Description: Uses credential theft phishing lures sent as Microsoft Teams chats.
Uses previously compromised Microsoft 365 tenants to create new domains that appear as technical support entities for further phishing attacks.
Engages users to approve MFA prompts via social engineering messages.
Regularly utilizes token theft techniques for initial access.
Uses password spray attacks tailored to avoid detection.
Exploits trusted relationships between service providers and downstream customers.
Misuses OAuth applications to maintain access and conduct post-compromise activity.

Techniques.Technique: Advanced Techniques to Compromise Authentication Mechanisms

ReportExcerpts.Title: Phishing Campaign Targeting German Political Parties
ReportExcerpts.Details: Used ROOTSAW to deliver WINELOADER backdoor, representing a shift to targeting political entities alongside traditional diplomatic targets.

ReportExcerpts.Title: Increased Phishing Operations in Ukraine
ReportExcerpts.Details: Targeted foreign embassies in Ukraine, including Moscow’s partners, with phishing emails to collect intelligence amidst Ukraine's counteroffensive.

Recommendations: Enable and enforce MFA for all user accounts.
Regularly audit and restrict OAuth applications.
Reinforce social engineering detection training among users.
Implement robust password policies to defend against password spray attacks.
Monitor for suspicious MFA prompt activity and other login anomalies.
Update software and systems to patch known vulnerabilities promptly.
